title: A sew font
content:

thanks

hernando

author: hernando

comments.content: Wow, we've had a lot of requests for this style lately. That's three this week I think. [FF Singer](http://web.archive.org/web/20130915054352/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_singer/) is a good option.
